entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -27.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -31.3°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Blowing snow in outlying areas this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow in outlying areas early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
